make this more stylish with tailwind glass backgrounds and light pink theme and purple shades and beveled edges and shadows

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "For the risk score representation, do you prefer a numerical system (e.g., 1-10) or a categorial system (e.g., Low, Medium, High) to denote the risk associated with each crypto project?", "option1": "Numerical System (1-10)", "option2": "Categorical System (Low, Medium, High)"}, {"question 2": "Regarding the 'auto-stake' feature, should its explanation be a part of the button (e.g., tooltip on hover) or a separate informational section near the button?", "option1": "Tooltip on hover", "option2": "Separate informational section"}], "input_token_count": 334, "output_token_count": 148, "time_taken": "0:00:06.329628"}

Thanks for the detailed information! We're currently working on building a bright red themed list including popular crypto projects to stake eth against. We'll make sure to include the average yield, risk score, likelihood of slashing, and an "auto-stake" button as you've requested. And don't worry, we won't forget the tilda at the end of the vue.js template for HTML.

build a big list of popular crypto projects to stake eth against, listing their avg yield, risk score, likelihood of slashing, and big "auto-stake" button with an explanation that this will automatically choose best yield (it will yield farm on behalf of the user). make it a bright red theme, like netflix. make sure you don't forget the tilda at the end of the vue.js template for HTML

The user requested the design of a bright red-themed page for staking ETH against popular crypto projects, featuring a list with average yield, risk score, likelihood of slashing, and an "auto-stake" button for automated yield farming. They also sought detailed explanations for each input field, integration of various UI elements such as advanced search functionality, a detailed risk assessment guide, and real-time notifications, among others. Additionally, the user inquired about options for a dynamic or static list of crypto projects, and whether the "auto-stake" feature should rebalance stakes or make a one-time selection.

For a separate project, the user wanted the implementation of a node operator onboarding section with wallet connectivity, staking for the $SXT token, and a public key submission field. They also requested the replacement of a section with an interactive SVG of a cat and details on its implementation, alongside customer-centric features such as a comprehensive search functionality for travel, dynamic background changes, and user review integrations.

Another task involved designing a hero section with a large call to action and testimonials for a plane booking service, including a detailed top navigation with placeholder content and login buttons. For customer support requests, the user opted for a bright purple theme with a detailed submission form and wrapped existing feature sections in beautiful purple-shaded containers.

Lastly, the user sought to revamp the hero section of a webpage with a new design that incorporated a top call to action, a bottom testimonial section, a bright purple theme, rounded/beveled edges, and asked for a description of the project for further assistance.
